text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.title: Powered Signs Config
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.play: Distance away a player is sent the contents of the sign, in the shape of a box
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.cool: The amount of ticks to wait before allowing another message to be sent
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.logS:
Logs the position of signs that print out to players.
Will spam the log file, use only if spamming becomes an issue.
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.part:
Powered signs emit redstone particles when powered.
Particles are rendered on the server, sorry.
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.audi:
Powered signs make a sound when powered.
Uses the BLOCKS volume slider.
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.powe: When "false", signs only print when the block is strongly powered
text.autoconfig.poweredsigns.option.Debu: Will spam the log file, toggle this if you're having issues or plan to make a GH Issue.
